blogPost.title: EdGE Networks is now EDGE
blogPost.content:
New look. New feel. Continued commitment.

We are proud to share that apart from a new name, we have a new brand identity as well. It may seem like a significant change but be rest assured, our core beliefs still remain the same. We are and will always be dedicated to simplifying talent decisions helping companies and individuals spot opportunities and create possibilities by offering intelligent decision-making capabilities. 

 

Simplifying decisions is in our DNA. We do it through our products built using our smart AI technology – The EDGE GraphTM - an astute knowledge graph, which has analyzed over 10 million job descriptions and 35 million candidate profiles. Our product taglines capture this essence and further fortifies our commitment to our customers. 

 

EDGE now has a fresh, youthful, and confident new look, with bold and defining colours. If you look closely, the new brand logo embodies our brand statement ‘Infinite possibilities, simplified’, and illustrates our energy and commitment to building strong brand value. The changes have been taken with a vision to better communicate the breadth of expertise that EDGE truly represents and realign with our vision and value proposition. 

 

We’ve long believed that organizations tend to get nonchalant doing the mundane, just making incremental changes. But in the space, we cater to, where unconventional ideas drive the next big thing, one needs to be uncomfortable and constantly innovating to be there on the top. And this move is a proactive approach in that direction.

 

Thank you for your continuous support. We look forward to many more.
blogPost.subTitle: We are and will always be dedicated to simplifying talent decisions helping companies and individuals spot opportunities and create possibilities by offering intelligent decision-making capabilities.
